title: You Can Go Anywhere With Your Hands
description: This is a sketch that I worked on in High School. As a child, before the age of smartphones, I was extremely bored during car rides. So I would point my hands outside of the car window and imagine that they were some kind of magical transportation device going at 60 mph, jumping over building and cars that swept by.
